section.heading: Business transactions of member with limited cooperative association.
section.text: Subject to §§ 29-1008.18 and 29-1008.19 and except as otherwise provided in the organic rules or a specific contract relating to a transaction, a member may lend money to and do other business with a limited cooperative association in the same manner as a person that is not a member.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 115 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
